item.title: JD Vance is right
item.description:
I get confused with Ohio Senator J.D. Vance enough as it is, given our similar face shapes, immaculate beards, and shared interest in conservative family policy. So it doesn‚Äôt help that we also seem to have surprisingly congruent views on geoeconomics‚Ä¶
